rules_text: Search your library for a creature card, reveal it, put that card into your hand, then shuffle. You lose life equal to that card's mana value.
flavor_text: [i]“That wasn't Brunhild!” Kriemhild protested. “Was or wasn't,” said the elder, “this problem remains yours to solve. You will soothe the spirits and return with lessons well learned. . . or you will not return at all.”[/i]
